summary: Feature request for a structured API reference for the PHP SDK. The user requested an organized list of functions and APIs provided by the package, with the discussion leading to implementation of phpdoc-based documentation and deployment to php.temporal.io.
userImpact: Users lack a centralized, structured reference for available PHP SDK functions and APIs.
proposedFix: Use phpdoc to generate HTML API documentation and publish it to php.temporal.io via CI/CD pipeline using Vercel deployment.
resolutionDetails: API documentation was generated using phpdoc and published to php.temporal.io, with implementation completed in PR #408.
keyQuote: I see the docs at https://docs.temporal.io/php/introduction/ but is there a structured list of functions etc that the package provides?
